ai-iti30:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti30:2.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-iti30:2.3_0: It’s when someone hasn’t done good and skillful things that keep them safe, but has done bad, violent, and depraved things.
ai-iti30:2.4_0: Thinking, ‘I haven’t done good things’, they’re mortified. Thinking, ‘I have done bad things’, they’re mortified.
ai-iti30:2.5_0: These are the two things that are mortifying.”
ai-iti30:2.6_0: That is what the Buddha said.

ai-iti30:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
